scripts.build:vercel: prisma generate && prisma migrate deploy && next build
scripts.db:sync: prisma migrate deploy && node scripts/importCsvProducts.js && node scripts/countProducts.js
scripts.db:sync:neon: prisma migrate deploy && node scripts/importCsvProducts.js && node scripts/countProducts.js
scripts.db:sync:neon-env: set DATABASE_URL=%NEON_DATABASE_URL%&& set SHADOW_DATABASE_URL=%NEON_SHADOW_DATABASE_URL%&& prisma migrate deploy && node scripts/importCsvProducts.js && node scripts/countProducts.js
scripts.db:sync:local: set DATABASE_URL=%LOCAL_DATABASE_URL%&& set SHADOW_DATABASE_URL=%LOCAL_SHADOW_DATABASE_URL%&& prisma migrate deploy && node scripts/importCsvProducts.js && node scripts/countProducts.js
